thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Health Italia: Share Capital Increase Subscribed

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Health Italia: Share Capital Increase Subscribed
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - HEALTH ITALIA:
* SAID ON FRIDAY 2.5 MLN EUROS SHARE CAPITAL INCREASE SUBSCRIBED, 1.95 MLN SHARES WERE ISSUED
* SHARE CAPITAL INCREASE WAS IN KIND TRANSFER, FOLLOWING WHICH HEALTH ITALIA INCREASED ITS STAKE IN BASIS SPA TO 99.66 PCT
* HEALTH ITALIA FREE FLOAT AFTER TRANSACTION IS 23.38 PCT Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
